My name is

Bello Olaniyan.

I am a fullstack developer, a professional graphics designer and a
UI/UX engineer.

About Me

Passion for design and my crave for making things, landed me in design and code.

I am a fullstack developer, a professional graphics designer and a UI/UX engineer. I sometimes get stuck between choosing whether to stick to code or to just go with design. But somehow, I manage my two "loves" - code and design as a freelance techie with over 5 years of experience, even working for tech companies like Okiki cafe and Khrisfix Tech.

I build web products with HTML, CSS, SCSS, Javascript, React JS, Redux, Next JS, Bootstrap, Tail wind CSS and more.
I build graphics with Adobe Ilustrator, Adobe Photoshop, and Corel Draw.
While i build UI/UX designs with Figma and adobe XD

Like you can already guess, I am almost always in front of a screen or device. But when ever I am not, you're most likely to find me playing soccer, reading programming articles or having a good time with my friends and my Family.
I am just a message, mail or a call away - in case you are seeking to get the best hands on your next web or design project.
Cheers, and thanks for visiting my website.
